Name: Galvanised Nail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Scotch and honeyed spice with a hint of apple and elderflower plus a touch of zest lemon freshness.
History: Created in 2003 by yours truly, taking inspiration from the Rusty Nail .
Nutrition: One serving of Galvanised Nail contains 203 calories
